title.en: I Woke up as the Ugly Duckling

altTitles.ja: 不細工の公女になりました

altTitles.zh: 重生成为公爵家的丑女

altTitles.th: เมื่อฉันกลายเป็นเลดี้นอกคอก

altTitles.mn: Царай муутай гүнж болж төрсөн нь

description.de:
Was ist gut daran, als Tochter des Herzogs wiedergeboren zu werden, wenn man die Schande der Familie ist? Während ihre Geschwister talentiert und wunderschön sind, wurde die arme Sylvia als fett und hässlich bezeichnet, mit einer berüchtigt schlechten Persönlichkeit obendrein. Sich daneben zu benehmen, um die Aufmerksamkeit ihres kalten Vaters zu bekommen, hat nur dazu geführt, dass sie von zu Hause verbannt wurde und ihr Leben in Verzweiflung endete. Aber als die neue „Sylvia“ fünf Jahre vor ihrem Tod aufwacht, könnte sie sich kaum weniger für die abfälligen Meinungen der anderen interessieren – sie wird dieses Leben auf ihre Weise leben! In einer Welt voller Dämonen und Diebe muss sie alle verfügbaren Ressourcen nutzen und sich darauf vorbereiten, alleine zu überleben. Sobald sie so weit ist, wird sie sich von ihrer Familien und den Fieslingen verabschieden ... also warum fangen plötzlich alle Leute, die sich vorher nie um sie gekümmert haben, an, sich für sie zu interessieren?

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/53601030), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8039386)

description.en:
Of all things, I possessed an ugly noble lady.

For the sake of receiving the attention of those who despised her, Sylvia Atlante, in the midst of all the ridicule and disrespect, made herself known as the “ugly lady”. However, one day, I happened to possess Sylvia’s body, who drank poison and ended her own life. I didn’t want to live like her.

“I’m rich and healthy, so why do I need to care about other people? This is my life, I’m going to live as I want!”

I just wanted to live a quiet life, but…

“Still, you’re my little sister, and you’re part of the Atlante family.”

The family’s a little strange.

“I’m interested in you, not your younger sister.”

“You must take responsibility for this body until the end. That’s the job of the contractor.”

“I, Theve Hiddleton, swear to be the sword of Sylvia Atlante and devote everything to her.”

“I won’t bother you. So please, keep me by your side!”

“There’s nothing in this world I can’t find. So don’t even try to run away from me.”

The handsome guys who I thought I’d never get involved with stuck around. What’s wrong with everyone? Isn’t this too different from Sylvia’s memory? I just wanted to live a peaceful life?!

---
What good is being reborn as the duke's daughter when you're the shame of the family? While her siblings were talented and beautiful, poor Sylvia was called fat and ugly, with a rumored bad personality to boot. Acting out for her cold father's attention only got her exiled from home and made her take her own life. But when the new "Sylvia" wakes up five years before her death, she could care less about the snarky opinions of others–she'll live this life her own way. In a world crawling with demons and thieves, she must use all the resources at her fingertips and prepare to survive on her own. Once she does, it's goodbye to her family and the naysayers... so why are the people who never cared about her before starting to take an interest in her?

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/53601030), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8039386)

description.fr:
Quel intérêt de me réincarner dans le corps de la fille du duc si c'est pour que tout le monde me déteste?! Tandis que ses frères et sœurs étaient adorés de tous pour leur beauté et leur gentillesse, Sylvia, elle, subissait de lourdes moqueries à cause de son apparence et des rumeurs sur son affreuse personnalité. Après avoir tenté plus d'une fois d'obtenir l'attention de son père, elle a fini par ne s'attirer que des problèmes et s'ôter la vie par désespoir... Et me voilà maintenant dans son corps, cinq ans avant ce tragique incident, et je ne compte pas laisser la situation telle quelle. Je me fiche de ce que pensent les autres, je compte bien me faire une place dans ce monde rempli de difficultés, de dangers et de magie. Maintenant, j'aimerais juste savoir pourquoi, alors que je ne cherche plus à avoir l'attention de qui que ce soit, tout le monde semble soudainement s'intéresser à Sylvia...?

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/53601030), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8039386)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%AA%BB%EB%82%9C%EC%9D%B4-%EA%B3%B5%EB%85%80%EA%B0%80-%EB%90%98%EC%97%88%EC%8A%B5%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2448), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/56148134)

description.tr:
Her şeyden önce çirkin, asil bir bayanın bedenine reenkarne oldum.

Onu küçümseyenlerin dikkatini çekmek uğruna Sylvia Atlante, tüm alay ve saygısızlığın ortasında kendisini “çirkin leydin” olarak tanıttı.

Ancak bir gün, zehir içen ve kendi hayatına son veren Sylvia’nın vücuduna reenkarne oldum. Lakin onun gibi yaşamak istemiyordum.

“Zengin ve sağlıklıyım, öyleyse neden diğer insanları önemsemem gerekiyor? Bu benim hayatım, istediğim gibi yaşayacağım!”

Sadece sessiz bir hayat yaşamak istemiştim fakat…

Yine de, sen benim küçük kardeşimsin ve sen Atlante ailesinin bir parçasısın.

Bu aile biraz tuhaf.

“Seninle ilgileniyorum, küçük kız kardeşinle değil.”

“Sonuna kadar bu bedenin sorumluluğunu almalısın. Yüklenicinin işi bu.”

“Ben, Theve Hiddleton, Sylvia Atlante’nin kılıcı olmaya yemin ederim ve her şeyi ona adıyorum.”

“Sizi hiçbir zaman rahatsız etmeyeceğim. Bu yüzden lütfen beni yanınızda tutun!”

“Bu dünyada bulamadığım hiçbir şey yok. Dolayısıyla sakın benden kaçayım bile deme”

Asla temas halinde bulunamayacağımı düşündüğüm yakışıklı adamlar etrafımda dönüp duruyorlar.

Herkesin nesi var böyle? Bu Sylvia’nın yaşadıklarından çok farklı değil mi? Yoksa sadece huzurlu bir hayat yaşamak istediğim için olabilir mi?!

---

description.zh:
突如其来的一场怪病，带走了她的性命，再睁眼，却成了公爵家人人厌弃的丑女——被家人蔑视、嘲笑，甚至无情抛弃的公爵之女西维亚• 亚特兰特。 “出身在有权有势的家族，还拥有健康的身体，我又何必要在意世俗的眼光，我的人生，我做主！” 仅仅是想要重获新生的她，等待她的将是怎样的命运？

---
